list.en: Did you like the bar?
Do you feel like a drink? How about another drink?
list.cn: 你想喝一杯吗?再来一杯怎么样?

list.en: Shall we go to the pub?
Which bar are we going to this evening?
list.cn: 今晚我们要去哪个酒吧?

list.en: When will the bar open?
There was a floor show in our pub. Would you like to see it?
list.cn: 我们的酒吧里有一场现场表演。你想看看吗?

list.en: I'd like the cocktail you made for me last time.
list.cn: 我想要你上次给我做的鸡尾酒。

list.en: Ice cubes are available on the bar over there.
I'll have something sharp tonight.
list.cn: 今晚我要吃点锋利的东西。

list.en: Isn't there anyone else who wants to sing?
I'll put the song at the front of the list.
list.cn: 我会把这首歌放在列表的最前面。

list.en: He's really hogging the Mike.
I love to sing karaoke.
We are going to ktv after dinner.
Where is the microphone?
I can't find a song that I like in the catalogue.
list.cn: 我在目录里找不到一首我喜欢的歌。

list.en: This isn't my song.
Push the red button on the mic to turn it on.
list.cn: 按麦克风上的红色按钮打开麦克风。

list.en: Push the green button on the mic to bring it down half a key.
list.cn: 按麦克风上的绿色按钮，把它降半调。

list.en: I'd like to request a song.
Now it's my turn.
You're a good singer.
My singing is out of tune.
Are you good at singing?
How long have you been a photographer?
Why don't you get this picture enlarged?
list.cn: 你为什么不把这张照片放大呢?

list.en: Where did you get the picture frames?
You've won the.
You're won the photographic prize for this year.
list.cn: 你获得了今年的摄影奖。

list.en: What's the most exciting photographic job you've ever worked on?
list.cn: 你从事过的最令人兴奋的摄影工作是什么?

list.en: These are gorgeous.
They came out really well.
Photography is the one thing I really enjoy.
list.cn: 摄影是我真正喜欢的一件事。

list.en: Press the button.
You are very photogenic.
Is this really you in the picture?
It's a good picture.
May I take pictures here?
How do you like your new digital camera?
list.cn: 你觉得你的新数码相机怎么样?

list.en: I heard you had spent so much time and money in collecting stamps.
list.cn: 我听说你在集邮上花了很多时间和金钱。

list.en: When did you begin collecting stamps?
list.cn: 你什么时候开始集邮的?

list.en: I have sixty albums of stamps.
I'd like to have some commemorative stamps.
I wonder whether you are really fond of collecting stamps?
list.cn: 我想知道你是否真的喜欢集邮?

list.en: Have you ever been to a stamp exhibition?
I've collected few stamps years.
list.cn: 几年来我收集了一些邮票。

list.en: When and where was the first stamp made?
list.cn: 第一张邮票是何时何地制作的?

list.en: I derive great satisfaction from stamp collection.
list.cn: 我从集邮中得到极大的满足。

list.en: My hobby is collecting stamps.
We have the same hobby of collecting stamps.
list.cn: 我们有集邮的共同爱好。

list.en: I'm interested in collecting stamps.
Does QQ have the voice chat function?
Do you often surf the net?
Are you online?
Do you have an email address?
I am crazy about online chat.
I have a webcam on my computer.
This function is appropriate for me to talk with people.
list.cn: 这个功能适合我与人交谈。

list.en: My username is Sarah.
I've just invited you to join my buddy list.
list.cn: 我刚刚邀请你加入我的好友名单。

list.en: I'm hooked on net chat.
I sign on to the Internet every day.
You are the best girl I've met on the Internet.
list.cn: 你是我在网上遇到的最好的女孩。

list.en: You need to change your password.
When I don't feel like talking to certain people online, I pretend that I'm offline.
list.cn: 当我不想在网上和某些人说话时，我就假装自己离线了。

list.en: Dial up is too slow, so I use wireless broadband.
list.cn: 拨号太慢了，所以我用无线宽带。

list.en: Don't spend too much time chatting on the net.
list.cn: 不要花太多时间在网上聊天。

list.en: How did you enjoy the ball?
list.cn: 你在舞会上玩得怎么样?

list.en: May I have the first dance?
list.cn: 我可以请您跳第一支舞吗?

list.en: What dances do you like?
How many tips of dance have you learned?
I would like to invite you to a ball next sunday.
list.cn: 我想邀请你参加下星期天的舞会。

list.en: I am no good at dancing.
I am learning new dance steps now.
list.cn: 我现在正在学习新的舞步。

list.en: Will you go to the dance?
I am nuts about dance party.
What about another dance?
Let's go dancing tonight.
The waltz is a beautiful dance.
list.cn: 华尔兹是一种美丽的舞蹈。

list.en: I've just learned how to dance this new step.
list.cn: 我刚学会跳这个新舞步。

list.en: Do you like milk and sugar in your tea?
list.cn: 你喜欢在茶里放牛奶和糖吗?

list.en: More tea, sir.
Do you like your tea strong or weak?
I'd like my tea real hot.
I'd like a cup of hot tea.
I always have black tea in the morning.
How do you like your tea? Is it too strong?
list.cn: 你喜欢什么样的茶?是不是太浓了?

list.en: I prefer strong tea.
It's just the right taste.
Please be careful. The tea is very hot.
Some tea spilled.
We have a great choice of herbal teas.
list.cn: 我们有很多花草茶可供选择。

list.en: I feel like a cup of green tea.
This tea tastes just right.
Have you just been to the cinema?
Would you like to go to see the movie?
What's on tonight?
When is the next showing?
What do you think of her acting?
list.cn: 你认为她的演技怎么样?

list.en: What time does the movie start?
Is that film subtitles in both Chinese and English?
list.cn: 那部电影有中英文字幕吗?

list.en: Let's go to a movie tomorrow, shall we?
list.cn: 我们明天去看电影，好吗?

list.en: What movie do you want to see?
How do you think about that movie?
list.cn: 你觉得那部电影怎么样?

list.en: Have you seen this movie?
I want to go to see a movie.
I have two tickets for today's films.
list.cn: 我有两张今天的电影票。

list.en: The movie was over shortly before six.
list.cn: 电影快到六点就结束了。

list.en: The film is worth seeing.
The show has already started.
I prefer a feature film to an action film.
list.cn: 我喜欢故事片而不喜欢动作片。

list.en: This is a sensational film.
list.cn: 这是一部耸人听闻的电影。

list.en: I want to see science fiction.
It was a touching movie.
I really enjoy this movie.
list.cn: 我真的很喜欢这部电影。

list.en: What kind of music do you like best?
Do you often listen to songs on the radio?
list.cn: 你经常听收音机里的歌吗?

list.en: Do you like singing?
What concert is it?
How important is music to you?
It's the theme tune of Titanic.
list.cn: 这是《泰坦尼克号》的主题曲。

list.en: I enjoy singing, let alone listening to music.
list.cn: 我喜欢唱歌，更不用说听音乐了。

list.en: That song is my best song.
I like popular music best.
I have no ear for music.
Do you like to listen to English songs?
Do you go in for jazz music?
Pop music is mostly program music.
list.cn: 流行音乐主要是节目音乐。

list.en: I don't understand classical music.
Don't pick or harm flowers in the park.
list.cn: 不要摘或伤害公园里的花。

list.en: Don't pick or harm flowers in the park.
list.cn: 不要摘或伤害公园里的花。

list.en: If it had been fine, we would have gone to the park.
list.cn: 如果天气好的话，我们就去公园了。

list.en: My father often takes me to the park on sundays.
list.cn: 我父亲经常在星期天带我去公园。

list.en: Jogging in the park becomes my routine.
list.cn: 在公园慢跑成了我的例行公事。

list.en: The park is only ten minutes from downtown.
list.cn: 公园离市中心只有十分钟的路程。

list.en: I often take my children to play in the park.
list.cn: 我经常带孩子们去公园玩。

list.en: She asked us if we would go to the park tomorrow.
list.cn: 她问我们明天是否去公园。

list.en: Generally speaking, parks are full on holidays.
list.cn: 一般来说，节假日公园里都挤满了人。

list.en: The park has many fine fountains.
list.cn: 公园里有许多漂亮的喷泉。

list.en: The air is so fresh in the park.
This city has many beautiful parks.
list.cn: 这个城市有许多美丽的公园。
